sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Action) Once per session, the character may make a Hard (3 difficulty dice) Mechanics check to perform the Improvised Detonation action and build an explosive device out of available materials. The device can be detonated via any logical means (timed delay, pressureactivated, or even a fuse) and when it explodes deals damage equal to the character's ranks in Intellect plus ranks in Mechanics plus net success on the initial check, and possesses the Blast quality at an equal value. The character can spend 1 triumph to increase the damage by an additional 2. A despair causes the device to detonate immediately in the owner's face. If the check would have been otherwise successful, the premature detonation does damage based on the successful check (and has an equivalent Blast quality). If the check would have failed, the premature detonation only does damage equal to ranks in Mechanics plus ranks in Intellect.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Improvised Detonation</name> <number>TAL0001252</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-05 22:49:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5c1eef652f18a850e0f497eef699b6ad</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-05 22:49:08</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
